## ContextEvent.eventSchema property

The event schema where one is available, or empty string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eventSchema: string;
```

## Example

'iglu:com.snowplowanalytics.snowplow/ad\_impression/jsonschema/1-0-0'
